name: CPPointOfInterestTemplate
desc: A template that displays a map with selectable points of interest.

items.name: init(title: String, pointsOfInterest: [CPPointOfInterest], selectedIndex: Int)
items.desc: Creates a Point of Interest template with a title, the points of interest to display, and the initial selection’s index.

items.name: class CPPointOfInterest
items.desc: An object that describes a point of interest on the template’s map and in its scrollable picker.

items.name: var pointOfInterestDelegate: CPPointOfInterestTemplateDelegate?
items.desc: The object that serves as the template’s delegate.

items.name: protocol CPPointOfInterestTemplateDelegate
items.desc: The methods to handle a Point of Interest template’s events.

items.name: var pointsOfInterest: [CPPointOfInterest]
items.desc: The points of interest the template displays on the map and in the scrollable picker.

items.name: func setPointsOfInterest([CPPointOfInterest], selectedIndex: Int)
items.desc: Updates the points of interest and the current selection.
